column5: just returned from week of fishing. lodge owners were best in over 35years fishing canada. lodge was very nice. boats were great. i believe lake was turning over first part of week. but we still caught over 30 walleyes per day (2 persons). first 4 days fish was in 10'-12'. last three days 18'-30'. already made plans to go back next year. highly rec. lodge.
I agree. They do a good job. Hank and Cindy are new owners of the camp and eager to please the customers. Wabigoon has good walleye and muskie too.
